name: Expert Deer Hunting 3D
description: This game demands from you good shooting skills to running deer. You have to camouflage yourself against them. Fast running, massive figure, thick skin and strong body make the deer a difficult target to challenge. When the deer feels threatened, these wild animals can be really dangerous and attack on you instantly and fight intensively. You have no chance to escape when the deer attack. You have to kill the deer if you want to survive. Trees, mountains with a very realistic environment, ultimate hunting adventure lovers; you will love this amazing and addictive action, advanced first person sniper shooting game. Real environment and accurate shooting ability help you to survive against massive deer attacks. Do you trust your sniper shooting skills? Real 3D graphics, sound effects offer you a wonderful hunting experience with the real environment.
